content: How can the sentence "I love to play chess" be rewritten in 3rd person singular point of view using a formula format?

To convert the sentence "I love to play chess" into the third person singular point of view using a formula format, you can follow this structure:

1. Identify the subject: "I"
2. Replace with third person singular subject: "He/She"
3. Adjust the verb to match the subject: add "s" or "es" if needed.

Applying this to the sentence:

"I love to play chess" becomes "He/She loves to play chess."
